DOC.brief_summary: To test bioequivalence Doxazosin 4 Mg Orally-disintegrating Tablet Or Without Water Doxazosin 4 Mg Japanese Marketed Immediate Release Tablet Under Fasted Condition
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Doxazosin 4 Mg Orally-Disintegrating Tablet With Or Without Water To Doxazosin 4 Mg Japanese Marketed Immediate Release Tablet Under Fasted Condition
DOC.criteria: Japanese healthy male subject Baseline orthostatic hypotension define ≥20 mm Hg reduction SBP , ≥10 mm Hg reduction DBP and/or development significant postural symptom ( dizziness , lightheadedness , vertigo ) go supine stand position .
